translations: 社论式广告，软广告（指常作为杂志中心插页的正式广告文字）

sentences.sentence: The campaign will include pamphlets, posters, newspaper inserts and advertorials, an educational booklet, radio and television broadcasts and so on.
sentences.translation: 运动内容包括宣传小册子、海报、报章杂志广告、防贪教育手册，以及电台和电视广播等等。

sentences.sentence: Using news release, releasing news release in local web portals (some nationwide web portals are appropriately selected), and releasing advertorials in traditional paper media.
sentences.translation: 使用新闻稿，在区域性门户网站（适当选择一些全国性门户网站）发布新闻稿，传统纸媒发布软文。

sentences.sentence: Special positions are subject to availability. All guaranteed position might not be cancelled after confirmation. Special booking such as insert, advertorials are available upon request.
sentences.translation: 本刊有权保留广告客户要求的指定位置，广告客户之预订确认后不得取消； 其它特殊规格如插页、软性文章等等的价目，可向本刊查询。
